title: Intimate Strangers
description: A day she won’t get over. A man she can’t forget.Kate was in love when she walked onto the boat that morning. Quietly plotting her own happy course as they set out for a day of deep-sea fishing. Then everything went terribly, tragically wrong, leaving her haunted by what she couldn’t change and stunned by what she wouldn’t.It was a simple, private charter. Easier than most because they only had two passengers. But Brady returned to the harbor with a police escort and a lot of questions. No one knows how they’ll react to a traumatic event until it happens.He blames himself for going out without his full crew, but not for needing and giving comfort in the chaos.Can an emotionally charged incident lead to something lasting between two people who are forever changed by what they shared?Enjoy this provocative novella full of twists, turns, and explosive sexual tension today.Pelican Cay - A series that challenges what we presume is right, wrong, and excusable in the gray. Dare to love.
author: Tara Mills
